title: Domestic Violence Awareness Month
context: [ยง8-21] Domestic Violence Awareness Month. The month of October shall be known and designated as &ldquo;Domestic Violence Awareness Month&rdquo; to promote public awareness of domestic violence as a significant societal, public health, and criminal justice problem. This month is not and shall not be construed as a state holiday. [L 2012, c 73, ยง1]
